translation.en: Welcome to the Lucky Strike program.
translation.it: e benvenuti al Lucky Strike Program.

translation.en: Welcome back to the world of the living.
-[indistinct PA announcement] -So?
[echoing] Good morning, Tessa. I'm Dr. Sarkisian.

translation.en: You've been in a very bad car accident.
translation.it: Hai avuto un brutto incidente d'auto.

translation.en: You ruptured your heart due to trauma, which we were forced to repair surgically.
translation.it: Hai riportato una lesione cardiaca e sei stata sottoposta a un intervento.

translation.en: Morning.
-Morning. -I made pancakes.
Oh, I'm sorry. I'm gonna go shoot photos.

translation.en: Oh, it's so cold outside. Yeah, I just don't want to miss the morning light.

translation.en: Well, maybe when you're back, we could do a little research for colleges.

translation.en: All right. Bye.
She hides behind that camera.
She's not taken a single picture of us.
translation.it: A noi non ne ha mai fatta una.

translation.en: You're too pretty. You'd break her lens.
translation.it: Sei troppo bella. Le rompi l'obiettivo.

translation.en: Hey, I told you. You've gotta let her come to you.

translation.en: It's been a year. Signing a piece of paper doesn't make us her parents.

translation.en: Actually it does.
♪ Teenage headache dreams ♪

translation.en: You open, Sherman? I am for you, Tessa.
Um, I think I'm a little short.
That's no crime. I'm only 5'6".

translation.en: Enjoy the show.
Sherman, where are the subtitles?
You watch. I'll translate.
"It's the first time we've met in daylight."

translation.en: "But you're very early."
I think I'm just gonna go tell the theater owner.

translation.en: I can get my money back.
I've seen this film before. I don't think you want to miss it.

translation.en: Does it have a happy ending?
No. Definitely not.
Okay. Then I'll stay.
"You gonna eat all that chili yourself?"
"In this heat, you're mad."
"I eat chili no matter how hot it is, Betty."

translation.en: -[both speaking French] -"Those bastards." "What?"
"Never mind. Kiss me."
"Those bastards. How could they do this to you?"

translation.en: I'm sorry. How long was I doing that?

translation.en: I lost feeling about an hour ago, so I'm not sure.

translation.en: -Why didn't you say something? -Um, the movie is a bit of a downer, so…

translation.en: It's a love story. [sniffles]
I mean, not all love stories are downers.

translation.en: All the good ones are.
Romeo and Juliet, Anna Karenina,
translation.it: Beh, Romeo e Giulietta, Anna Karenina, Il paziente inglese.

translation.en: -The English Patient. -Mm-hmm.
I think it's the ending of a relationship,

translation.en: What about Pride and Prejudice?

translation.en: Jane Eyre? Those both have happy endings.

translation.en: That's only because the writer chose to end their love stories prematurely.

translation.en: Wow. That is a really interesting way
translation.it: Wow. È un modo molto interessante per non ammettere che ti sbagli.

translation.en: of not admitting you're wrong.
translation.it: È un modo molto interessante per non ammettere che ti sbagli.

translation.en: Come on! Okay. Picture this.
Picture that Leonardo DiCaprio didn't die at the end of Titanic.

translation.en: -Do I have to? Oof. -You have to.
Jack Dawson is a jobless, penniless gambler,
translation.it: Jack Dawson è un giocatore d'azzardo disoccupato e squattrinato

translation.en: who possessed, at best, marginal artistic talent.
-He saved Rose's life. -Right, of course.

translation.en: that she really thought that he'd give her a life of passionate adventure?

translation.en: Titanic 2. If you thought part one was a disaster…

translation.en: Oh, my gosh.
-I-- -[Sherman] Time to go!
Jesus, this guy is getting a one-star review, for sure.

translation.en: So, um, how did you get so good at speaking French?
My dad is a foreign languages professor.

translation.en: So by the time I was 12, he had me fluent in French, Spanish and Italian.
translation.it: e a 12 anni mi aveva già insegnato francese, spagnolo e italiano.

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my gosh. If I could just read Dante's Inferno in the original Italian,

translation.en: -Really? -No. No, I've never gotten that before.

translation.en: Plus, I'm also kind of addicted to the smell of the developing chemicals.

translation.en: The fumes make me a little delirious. [laughs]
Kind of like what your eyes are doing to me right now.
That…
-That was really cheesy. -No, no.
It was… It was…
a little cheesy, yeah.
It sounded perfect in my head.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Then let me imagine that for a sec, okay.

translation.en: -Still bad? -It's worse, actually.
Somehow, I don't know.
Um, I should probably… Yeah, me too.
Um, thank you for letting me whisper in your ear for three hours.

translation.en: You are welcome.
-Skylar. -What?
My name is… It's Skylar.

translation.en: I'm Tessa.
Maybe I'll see you here again sometime.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like that.
Oh! My jacket.
Sky. You're alive!
Come on. I want to show you something.
Sky!
Bad dream.
You called out his name.
It's called a visitation dream. We see lots of 'em around here.

translation.en: It's all part of the grieving process.

translation.en: I know. It just felt like Skylar was really here.
translation.it: Sembrava che Skylar fosse davvero qui.

translation.en: -Doris would love to hear about that. -Who's Doris?
translation.it: A Doris piacerebbe saperlo. Chi è Doris?

translation.en: A patient writing a book on the afterlife.
translation.it: Una paziente che scrive un libro sull'aldilà.

translation.en: Okay.
The other day, she offered to read my aura. I politely declined.

translation.en: -What is that? -Your belongings from the crash.
They closed the accident report already?
Well, neither driver had drugs or alcohol in their system.
translation.it: Eravate entrambi negativi ad alcol e droghe.

translation.en: That's usually the end of it.
They never even interviewed me.
You said you didn't remember anything about the accident?

translation.en: -I don't. -Maybe that's for the best.
[Dr. Sarkisian] I'm very encouraged, Tessa.
The scan shows your right ventricle is functioning quite well, despite the tear.
translation.it: Il ventricolo destro funziona, nonostante la lesione.

translation.en: Finally, some good news.
It is more than good.
Ninety-nine out of 100 with this same injury die on my table.
translation.it: Con questa ferita si muore in 99 casi su 100.

translation.en: I did die.
Only for a short time.
I could see Skylar.
Like, he was in this… this crazy white light.
translation.it: Come se fosse in questa strana luce bianca…

translation.en: What is that? Was she, you know, hallucinating?
When the body undergoes severe trauma…
-[heartbeat thumping] -…the hypothalamus can flood the brain
translation.it: l'ipotalamo può inondare il cervello di endorfine antidolorifiche.

translation.en: -with pain-relieving endorphins. -[Vickie] So when can we take her home?

Jazz?
[Skylar] You watch, I'll translate.
[PA announcement] X-ray tech to ICU. Any available X-ray tech to ICU.

Room B424, girl with the broken heart?

translation.en: [laughing] Relax.
I'm not psychic. Jasmine told me you might come looking for me.

Thank you.
Are your hands injured?
Excuse me?
From the accident. Did you hurt your hands at all?

translation.en: Oh, come on. Come on. [chuckles]
So, what is your book about?

After Death Communication.
Okay, so you believe that dead people can contact us?

they call out to us in voice.
And other times, we can smell their cologne or perfume in the air.

translation.en: No matter how they communicate, the message is the same.

translation.en: "I'm still here."
"And your grief, like a beacon, calls me to your side."

translation.en: like with you and your boyfriend,

Like things left undone or unsaid.

Reach back.

[teacher] Tessa, you're up.

-[class laughs] -It's a cell phone tower, disguised as a tree.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
I know you're still a junior, but I think you have a good shot of getting into the Rhode Island School of Design.

Just like a point of view. You know, something to say that's my own.

No. People.
You know, Tessa, before an artist can find her voice, she has to find a subject she loves.

[Skylar] I should probably… Yeah, me too.
♪ Let's get older tonight ♪

Do you think Judd can see me from here?
-Hey! -You are fired. Give me this.
Assistanting is not my thing. My bad.

Row!

-Whoo! Whoo! -Yeah!
-[both laughing] -Yes!

translation.en: -I think I'm gonna go. -Are you crazy?
You've been obsessed about this guy for like months, and you're just gonna ditch?

He just won the race. Congratulate him.
Okay.
Can I put this on my Story? If you wanna die.

translation.en: Tessa! Hey-- Oh!
-Oh, my God! Sorry. -Whoa, whoa!

translation.en: -Hey, this one does. -Well, they definitely don't read

That is what I call a finish.
-Um… -Movie theater girl.
-Her name is Tessa. -How did you…

Told you. She's analog. Like me.

Are you going to be heading back to Edison tonight?
No, I'm gonna be staying at Grandpa Mike's. Um…

[softly] Oh, my God.
Movie theater girl would love -to chill out and hang. -[Leigh chuckles]

-[footsteps departing] -Thank you, Mom. That's my mom. She does, uh, parties.

You too.

Oh, yeah! They're so cute. They look so in love.

-Whoa! -If you wanna take a look.

Echo and the Bunnymen. Your mom's like my new bestie.

-It's the other way. -[both chuckle]
-It's okay. I won't tell the '80s police. -Shut up.

translation.en: I have spent every summer of my life down here with my grandfather.

translation.en: They were color photos, Shannon. I don't… I don't shoot in color.
translation.it: Erano foto a colori, Shannon. Non scatto a colori né ho il necessario per svilupparle.

translation.en: I don't even own the chemicals to develop it.
translation.it: Non scatto a colori né ho il necessario per svilupparle.

translation.en: -But you can't show me the photos? -No, I told you.
translation.it: Non puoi mostrarmi le foto? No. Il fissaggio non ha funzionato. Non so perché,

translation.en: The fixer didn't work. I don't know why.
translation.it: No. Il fissaggio non ha funzionato. Non so perché,

translation.en: But maybe spirits can't be captured on film or something. I don't know.
translation.it: ma forse gli spiriti non possono essere ripresi. Non lo so.

translation.en: All right.
Tess, I want to believe you, I swear,
but messages from the other side?
I just think he wants the same thing I want.
To see me one last time so that we can actually say goodbye to each other.
translation.it: Vedermi un'ultima volta per poterci salutare.

translation.en: You loved him, and he knew that. What more is there to say?

translation.en: [teacher] Two-minute warning.
Please take your seats and set your phones to silent mode.
Dude, we need to focus, okay? You're not even listening to me.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo concentrarci, ok? - Non mi ascolti nemmeno.

translation.en: Yes, I am! I just don't think
translation.it: Sì, invece. Ma non credo si tratti di foto a colori, di sale d'attesa o di stato intermedio.

translation.en: this is about color photos or waiting rooms or the in-between.
translation.it: Ma non credo si tratti di foto a colori, di sale d'attesa o di stato intermedio.

translation.en: -Then what is it about? -A girl who won't let go.
translation.it: - E di che si tratta? - Di non lasciarlo andare.

translation.en: Just think about it. Okay?
Sorry.
Cell phone use is prohibited during the test!
Didn't I tell you the drive would be worth it?
This negative's made of glass. It's coated in collodion,
translation.it: È un negativo di vetro, ricoperto di collodio

translation.en: then dipped in silver nitrate, which is crazy.
translation.it: e immerso nel nitrato d'argento, che è pazzesco

translation.en: Because after that, you only have a few minutes to take the photo or the chemicals completely dry up.
translation.it: perché dopo hai poco tempo per scattare o le sostanze chimiche si asciugano.

translation.en: Hmm. That's exactly what I was gonna say.
It's only ten grand.
It's a little out of my budget.

translation.en: But I can offer you a gluten-free cracker with rotting cheese on it.
translation.it: È un po' fuori budget, ma posso offrirti un cracker senza glutine con del formaggio marcio.

translation.en: You're so generous. It's crazy.
Sorry. Am I interrupting?
No. Julian, hi.
We were just talking about how much we love the photo.
translation.it: - Dicevamo che adoriamo la foto. - Oh, sì.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's wonderful, isn't it?
I just love how he prioritizes mood and atmosphere over subject.

translation.en: That is a very sophisticated insight for a girl your age.

translation.en: Julian, meet my very sophisticated girlfriend.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Tessa. Nice to meet you.
-Congratulations on this. This is great. -Oh, thank you.
translation.it: - Congratulazioni. È una meraviglia. - Grazie. Ok, ragazzi. Seguitemi.

translation.en: Okay, kids, follow me. I wanna show you something.
translation.it: - Congratulazioni. È una meraviglia. - Grazie. Ok, ragazzi. Seguitemi. Vi mostro una cosa.

translation.en: Doesn't it look amazing all lit up like this?
translation.it: Non è fantastica, tutta illuminata così?

translation.en: -Like it belongs here? -It does belong here.
translation.it: Come se fosse il suo posto? Sì, è proprio il suo posto.

translation.en: Tessa, you have an extraordinary eye.
I don't understand.
It's for sale for $1,000.

translation.en: Yeah, and we already have two serious inquiries.
translation.it: Sì, e abbiamo già due richieste serie.

translation.en: this photo is not for sale. This was a gift to Skylar.

translation.en: Can't you print another one?
I really don't want anyone looking at it. Can we please take it down?
translation.it: Non voglio che sia vista. Possiamo tirarla giù?

translation.en: Are you serious?
-Take it down. -Hey, it's okay. I'll take it down.
translation.it: - Tirala giù. - Ok, la tiro giù.

translation.en: Thank you.
That's exactly why I brought you here,
translation.it: Ti ho portata qui per dimostrarti quanto sono belle le tue foto.

translation.en: to prove that your photos are great. Even Julian thinks so.
translation.it: Ti ho portata qui per dimostrarti quanto sono belle le tue foto. Anche Julian lo pensa.

translation.en: I don't want this photo hanging on the wall of some random stranger.
translation.it: Non voglio questa foto appesa al muro di uno sconosciuto.

translation.en: This is my photo.
That means I get to decide who I share it with and I shared it with you.
translation.it: Decido io con chi condividerla e l'ho condivisa con te.

translation.en: You're right.
I'm sorry. I should have asked you first. I just wanted you to see how amazing you are.
translation.it: Scusa. Dovevo chiedertelo. Volevo che sapessi quanto vali.

translation.en: And that you can get into RISD.
translation.it: E che puoi entrare alla Scuola di Design.

translation.en: Who said anything about RISD?
translation.it: Chi ti ha detto della scuola?

translation.en: Shannon said your art teacher thought you could get in.
translation.it: Shannon ha detto che la tua insegnante pensava che potessi entrarci.

translation.en: I'm gonna kill her.
It is the best art college in the country.
translation.it: È la migliore scuola d'arte del Paese

translation.en: And it's in Providence, which is in the same city as Brown.
translation.it: ed è a Providence, nella stessa città della Brown.

translation.en: Which if you get in, we could be together.
-I-- -For real. Without a ticking clock.
Even if I could get into RISD,
which I totally doubt,
translation.it: cosa di cui dubito, non potrei permettermela.

translation.en: -I cannot afford that. -You're going to get into RISD.
translation.it: cosa di cui dubito, non potrei permettermela. Entrerai in quella scuola.

translation.en: -No. -And you could just get a scholarship.
translation.it: - No. - Con una borsa di studio.

translation.en: Skylar, Jesus, just give it up.
This is-- You can't fix everything.
translation.it: Questo è… Non puoi aggiustare tutto.

translation.en: What?
Your parents' marriage and me.
translation.it: Il matrimonio dei tuoi e me.

translation.en: Some things are just beyond repair. Is that why you won't say you love me?
translation.it: - Alcune cose sono irreparabili. - Perciò non dici che mi ami?

translation.en: Because you're… beyond repair.
That's…
-[machinery rattling] -[chattering on screen]
Hey, 8:00. I'm here like you asked. What's up?
translation.it: Sono le otto. Sono qui come volevi. Che c'è?

translation.en: I would like to take your portrait.
Uh… can I change first? No, you don't have to. You can just put that on.
What's that?
It was my mom's.
This really brings me back to college.
I had a boyfriend who was an art major. Made me pose for him.
translation.it: Avevo un ragazzo che studiava arte. Mi faceva posare per lui.

translation.en: So… Mel isn't the first person that you've been in love with.
translation.it: Quindi Mel non è la prima persona di cui ti sei innamorata?

translation.en: Gosh, no. I've loved a few men.
translation.it: Oddio, no. Ho amato qualche uomo.

translation.en: Maybe even one woman.
Did you love any of them more than they loved you?
translation.it: Hai amato qualcuno di loro più di quanto loro amassero te?

translation.en: Oh, probably. Didn't that scare you?
Knowing that someone could hurt you more than you could hurt them?
translation.it: Sapere che potevano ferirti più di quanto tu potessi ferire loro?

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe at first.
But then I think I realized if you protect yourself from the lows,
translation.it: Ma poi ho capito che se ti proteggi dai brutti momenti,

translation.en: you just end up missing all the highs too.
translation.it: finisci per perdere anche quelli belli.

translation.en: You love Skylar. Don't you?
I think I'm screwing it up.
Yeah. If it's not opening old wounds, it's probably not true love.
translation.it: Sì. Se non apre vecchie ferite, probabilmente non è vero amore.

translation.en: I just don't know what to do.
How do I get Skylar to understand that…
translation.it: Come faccio a far capire a Skylar…

translation.en: I love him. [chuckles]
You start by saying it.
You need to hear the words, Tessa.
You mean, he needs to hear the words.
No. You need to hear yourself say them.
translation.it: No. Devi sentire te stessa dirle.

translation.en: Out loud.
So the world knows your feelings count.
translation.it: E il mondo saprà che il tuo amore conta.

translation.en: That you count.
Vickie, I'm sorry.
For how I've treated you.
Hey, Google, dim the lights.
-Yes! -Oh, man. No smoke machine?
translation.it: - Sì. - Cavolo. Niente macchina del fumo?

translation.en: We begin this invocation
by asking the Archangel Michael
to protect us from any malevolent spirits that may be seeking a gateway into this earthbound sphere.
translation.it: protezione contro gli spiriti maligni che cercano accesso a questo mondo.

translation.en: You wrote this?
-You're interrupting my invocation. -I'm sorry!
It's just-- This is crazy. Did you read all of these books in two days?
translation.it: Ma è assurdo. Hai letto questi libri in due giorni?

translation.en: Bitch, yes! You know speed reading is my super power.
translation.it: Cavolo, sì. La lettura veloce è il mio super potere.

translation.en: Enjoy Your Own Funeral.
Yeah. That happens to be a classic of the paranormal metaphysical genre.
translation.it: Sì. È un classico del genere metafisico paranormale.

translation.en: -Now hush. -Okay.
We seek to communicate
translation.it: Cerchiamo di comunicare solo con lo spirito disincarnato

translation.en: only with the disembodied spirit formerly known as Skylar Adams.
translation.it: Cerchiamo di comunicare solo con lo spirito disincarnato conosciuto come Skylar Adams.

translation.en: No other spirits, please.
Okay.
-A Ouija board? -Please, Tess. This is a planchette.
translation.it: - Una tavola Ouija? - Ti prego, Tess. Questa è una planchette.

translation.en: There's a pencil tip attached to the bottom.

translation.en: We ask questions and Skylar communicates by moving our hands.

translation.en: Just like he did in the gym. Here. Fingers right there.

translation.en: Okay. Close your eyes.
-[gasps] Oh, my God, it moved. -Sorry. That was me. My bad.
translation.it: Si è mosso. Scusa, sono stata io. Colpa mia.

translation.en: It's called scrying. The deceased use the mirror as a gateway to the world of the living.
translation.it: È cristallomanzia. Lo specchio è la porta d'accesso al mondo dei vivi.

translation.en: All you have to do is stare into the mirror in a trance-like state.
translation.it: Devi solo fissare lo specchio in uno stato di trance.

translation.en: -That's it. -Okay.
Yeah, I'm sorry. Can we cover up Gambino and Drake? They're like really distracting me.
translation.it: Scusa. Evitiamo Gambino e Drake? Mi stanno distraendo.

translation.en: Instrumental Trans-Communication. The spirit uses the TV monitor as a bridge to our world.
translation.it: Transcomunicazione strumentale. Lo spirito usa un monitor come ponte.

translation.en: -What is this? Okay. -Here you go.
Blocks out the gamma rays.
Do you see anything? No. Do you?
Maybe I should have read more books.
No. No, you've been awesome.
[sighs] Oh, man. It's just Vickie.
Needs the car. She has a shift.

translation.en: Okay. I'll walk you out.
Okay.
-[electric warbling] -[voice murmuring]
Hello?
[GPS] Your route is being calculated.
Proceed for four miles to the entrance to Highway 85 South.

Tessa? Tessa!
Sorry! I've gotta do this.
Tessa!

translation.en: Continue straight for six miles.
[GPS] Take the next right, and in 100 feet, your destination will be on your right.

translation.en: [GPS] You have arrived at your destination.
I told you he wasn't gone yet.

translation.en: [laughs] Doris!
[chuckles] Come. Sit.
You know, I love coming out here at night to watch the shooting stars.

translation.en: My angels are calling me home.

translation.en: Skylar knows the end is near.
translation.it: Skylar sa che la fine è vicina.

translation.en: You don't have much time.
He's been communicating with you?
Well, I'm much closer to his world than you are.

translation.en: What does he want?
My help.
To bring the two of you together.
Can you?
Please.
In ancient folklore, the souls of the departed
translation.it: Nell'antico folklore, le anime dei defunti tornano nei luoghi

translation.en: returned to places where they experienced their greatest moments of love.
translation.it: le anime dei defunti tornano nei luoghi in cui hanno vissuto i loro più grandi momenti d'amore.

translation.en: That's where they were able to cross the life-death barrier.

translation.en: Now, perhaps if you and Skylar went back

translation.en: the window between worlds might open.

translation.en: Okay.
But be careful.
If you do manage to cross the barrier…

-[hip-hop music playing over speakers] -[teenagers laughing, chattering]
Tess? What's up?
This is not how I wanted my summer to go.

translation.en: Oh, no, what do you mean? What's wrong?

translation.en: They're so cute together, it's stupid. Who's cute?

translation.en: -Oh. Is that Judd? -[Shannon] That's Judd.
-Oh… -My vagina is weeping.

translation.en: That's terrible.
-Oh, my God! -What?
Billy Hodges came to my party?

translation.en: Ciao, Billy.
-Hey. -Hey.
[sighs] It's just three words.
Hi.
Can we go somewhere to talk for a second, alone?

translation.en: -Sure. -[both chuckle]
-Yo, brutha! -Hey.
-[Cortez] I just heard the good news. -What news?
-Um… -Oregon State!
-Nothing's official yet. -Oh, bullshit, bro.

translation.en: Come on.
-Um… -Okay.
Tess? Tess? Tessa?
-Tess, I was gonna tell you, I swear. -When?

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me? After I got into RISD? No, of course not.
translation.it: - Dopo l'ammissione alla Scuola di Design? - No.

translation.en: I just didn't want to give you another reason to back out.

translation.en: What about our plan?
The same city? No more ticking clock?
You weren't even gonna send in an application.
I applied last week.
Well, thank you for waiting until the last possible moment to tell me.

translation.en: The truth is, Tess, my dad's not…
translation.it: La verità, Tess, è che mio padre non…

translation.en: He's not doing that well.
He's really lonely in Oregon and I feel like I should stay with him for a while.

translation.en: Oregon is on the other side of the country.
translation.it: L'Oregon è dall'altra parte del Paese.

translation.en: -How were we ever gonna see each other? -It'll be hard.
I'm not switching schools permanently. I'm not!

translation.en: And if you get into RISD, and you will,
translation.it: Se entri alla Scuola di Design, ed entrerai,

translation.en: What happens if you start to like Oregon? What happens if your team starts to win?
translation.it: E se ti piacesse l'Oregon e il tuo team iniziasse a vincere?

translation.en: Tess, my dad needs me right now.

translation.en: He's my family. I don't--
[exhales] You don't understand about family because--
Because I don't have one.
That is not what I meant to say.
I knew this was gonna happen.
I get close to people and they disappear on me.

translation.en: This is just what happens to me.
-Tess. -No.
You're just gonna push me away like you do everyone?
The summer is over, Skylar.
And so are we.
Hey. Your ghost-hunting assistant has arrived.

translation.en: Here you go. Direct from Daddy's closet.
Yeah, this is full spectrum, motion sensor, night vision.
translation.it: Sì. Spettro completo, sensore di movimento, visione notturna. Perfetta. Grazie.

translation.en: Perfect. Thank you.

translation.en: Who gave you all the swag? Ah, Vickie's credit card.

translation.en: Whoa! Tessa's a bad, bad girl.
Bye.
Hey, if there are nudes of my mom on that camera, I do not want to know.

translation.en: [whispers] Shh. I'm gonna tell you.
[officer] Central, standby.
You Tessa Benson?
I can't believe you tracked my phone.
The day you stole Vickie's credit card was the day you gave up your right to privacy.
translation.it: Hai rubato la carta di credito di Vic, non hai diritto alla privacy.

translation.en: -What were you doing at the hotel so late? -I was taking photos.
translation.it: - Che ci facevi così tardi all'hotel? - Stavo facendo foto.

translation.en: I told you that. Are you trying to put yourself back in hospital?
translation.it: - Te l'avevo detto. - Vuoi tornare in ospedale?

translation.en: I don't understand this. Things were so much better this summer.
translation.it: Non capisco. Le cose andavano meglio quest'estate.

translation.en: -We started to feel like a family. -Do you not understand?
translation.it: - Eravamo come una famiglia. - Non capite?

translation.en: Geez, I wonder what happened at the end of the summer that might change my mood.
translation.it: Chissà cosa sarà stato a fine estate a cambiarmi l'umore.

translation.en: Do you know what we've been through?
-Stop. -Love hurts. You learn to live with it.
translation.it: - Smetti. - L'amore fa male. Ci si convive.

translation.en: Fuck off, Mel.
Hey, no! You don't get to talk to him like that.
translation.it: No. Non puoi parlargli così. Non dopo ciò che ha fatto per te.

translation.en: -Not after everything he's done for you. -There's no…
translation.it: No. Non puoi parlargli così. Non dopo ciò che ha fatto per te. - No. - Sei egoista…

translation.en: Tessa!
She's ruptured the repair.
Is it any wonder? The way she's been running around all crazy.
translation.it: C'è da sorprendersi? Corre in giro come una pazza.

translation.en: You can see right here
there is a fair amount of blood accumulated around her heart.
translation.it: la quantità di sangue intorno al cuore.

translation.en: -Will she be all right? -Not until we drain the chamber
translation.it: - Starà bene? - La camera va drenata.

translation.en: and reinforce the original suture. We're gonna schedule you for an OR first thing in the morning.
translation.it: E la sutura originale va rinforzata. Opereremo domattina.

translation.en: No, no, I-- I'm not-- You gotta let me go. You need to let me go.
-50 milligrams of Versed now. -[Tessa] Jasmine, no! Don't, please!
translation.it: - Tess. - Dovete. - Jasmine, no, non… - Tessa.

translation.en: Tessa, if I let you go home, you won't make it through the night.
translation.it: - Jasmine, no, non… - Tessa. Se ti lascio andare, non ce la farai.

translation.en: You don't understand. You don't understand.
-Get some rest now, honey. -I never got to tell… tell him.
Tell him what?
That…
They can never, ever tear us apart.
Tess? [groans] Shan, is that you?
Are you okay? You-- You sound medicated.
-I'm at the hospital. -What happened?
I saw him, Shan.
-No way. -At the hotel.
I couldn't touch him, but he was there.
translation.it: Non potevo toccarlo, ma era lì.

translation.en: I just have one place left that I have to go.
translation.it: Mi è rimasto un posto dove andare.

translation.en: -The lake. -Where he told you he loved you.
translation.it: - Il lago. - Dove ti ha detto che ti amava.

translation.en: I just don't really have much time left.
Okay, stay put. I'm coming.
Whoa.
-Now what? -I don't know.
-Room 22. -I'll take him.
-[chiming] -Oh. Ooh, two more.
-[chiming continues] -Witching hour. I'll take odds,
-you take evens. -Yeah.
-Whoa. -Let's go.
I could get used to this.
-Go, go, go. -Come on.
Oh, God.
[Shannon] Whoa. What the hell?
The lake is that way. You've gotta turn around.
translation.it: Il lago è di là. Devi girare.

translation.en: -I know. I know! -It's the wrong way! Please turn around.
translation.it: - Lo so. - È dall'altra parte. - Gira. - Non posso.

translation.en: -Let go. -What?
Let go!
I want a dead boyfriend too.
What are you doing here?
Skylar says he's called you and left you a ton of messages.
translation.it: Skylar ti ha lasciato un sacco di messaggi.

translation.en: -So? -So? You're ghosting your soul mate?
translation.it: - Allora? - Stai facendo ghosting alla tua metà?

translation.en: Shannon, my past is always just gonna get in the way.
translation.it: Il mio passato si metterà sempre in mezzo.

translation.en: Remember last year, you'd spotted that condemned bridge
translation.it: Ricordi quando vedesti quel ponte inagibile

translation.en: and just had to get a photo.
translation.it: e dovevi per forza fare una foto?

translation.en: You had to jump into the water,
even though it was freezing cold.
You know what I was thinking when I saw you down there swimming against the current to get your photo?

translation.en: "Imagine if Tess could be like this for her life, and not just for her art."
translation.it: Se Tess potesse essere così nella vita, non solo per la sua arte.

translation.en: He's leaving tonight, Tess.
Lock up for me.
This is where the accident happened. Do you know why he brought you here?
translation.it: Questo è il luogo dell'incidente. Sai perché ti ha portata qui?

translation.en: No. I don't know.
But I'm gonna find out.
Tess!
Oh, my God.
I need help!
[dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?
[Shannon] My friend just passed out. She has a heart condition.
translation.it: La mia amica è svenuta. Soffre di cuore.

translation.en: I'm at the corner of 6th and Channel. Please send somebody!
translation.it: Sono all'angolo tra la Sesta e il Canale. Per favore, mandate qualcuno.

translation.en: [Tessa] Skylar!
You forgot your hat. [chuckles]
I'm so sorry, Sky.
I'm sorry. I'm…
[sighs] I should have talked to you before making any decisions.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto parlartene prima di prendere una decisione.

translation.en: No. You shouldn't have to explain loving your family.
translation.it: No, non dovresti spiegare l'amore per la tua famiglia.

translation.en: If I hadn't spent my whole life just pushing everyone away, I would have understood that.
translation.it: Se non avessi passato la vita a respingere tutti, l'avrei capito.

translation.en: -No, come on, Tess. -I love you.
I said it.
Would you mind if I said it again?
I love you.
-[horn honking] -[Tessa screams]
-[Skylar] Hey. -[gasps]
-It's you. -It's me.
Oh, my God.
-I love you. -I know.
You told me. I love you.
translation.it: Me l'hai detto. Ti amo anch'io.

translation.en: So that's why you brought me here?
translation.it: È per questo che mi hai portata qui?

translation.en: So that I'd know?
Yeah. No regrets.
So, is this…
Is this it? We're still in Avalon.
Not exactly. It's like everything you see is a memory,
translation.it: Non proprio. È come se tutto ciò che vedi fosse un ricordo,

translation.en: a dream that we have that's just projected onto the world.
translation.it: un nostro sogno che viene proiettato nel mondo.

translation.en: It's kinda cool.
Come on. I'll show you. Okay.
[Shannon] Wait, wait.
[speaking French] Oh, my God. It's incredible!
Wait a minute! I'm speaking English, but it's coming out as French.
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Parlo inglese, ma esce in francese.

translation.en: [speaking French] Your pronunciation is not bad.
Can I tweak it a little? Be my guest.
Aren't you forgetting something?
Can I really? Try it.
I bet you wish you had your camera.
translation.it: Vorresti la tua macchina fotografica, vero?

translation.en: Not even for a second.
I came out here the first day I met you.
translation.it: Sono venuto qui quando ti ho conosciuta.

translation.en: My parents had just told me about the separation.
translation.it: I miei mi avevano detto della separazione

translation.en: Felt like it was the worst day of my life.
And then I met you.
And it was probably the best day of my life.
translation.it: Ed è stato il giorno più bello.

translation.en: Mine too.
[Dr. Sarkisian] There's nothing more we can do. She has a decision to make.
translation.it: Non possiamo fare altro. Deve prendere una decisione. Deve voler vivere.

translation.en: She has to want to live.
translation.it: Deve prendere una decisione. Deve voler vivere.

translation.en: Come back, Tess. Come back, Tess…
What's wrong?
I've spent my whole life learning how not to get hurt.
translation.it: Ho passato la vita a imparare a non farmi ferire.

translation.en: And that's no way to live.
translation.it: E così non si può vivere.

translation.en: But… But even with all the hurt that I feel right now…
translation.it: Ma anche con il dolore che provo adesso…

translation.en: I don't regret a thing.
Because I love you.
And knowing that I'm capable of feeling this way makes life worth living.
translation.it: Ed essere capace di sentirmi così rende la vita degna di essere vissuta.

translation.en: I don't want to say goodbye.
You don't have to.
Love never dies.
I'm gonna miss you.
[sobbing] I'm gonna miss you.
Go give us a happy ending, yeah?
translation.it: Vai a darci un lieto fine, ok?

translation.en: Hey.
No more dying, okay?
Oh, my God. It smells so good.
translation.it: - Mio Dio, che profumo. - Siediti. Mangia.

translation.en: -Sit down. There's plenty. -I can't. I gotta go.
translation.it: - Mio Dio, che profumo. - Siediti. Mangia. Devo andare.

translation.en: -Good luck, Tessa. -Love you.
-Go get 'em. -All right, bye.
See you later!
[Tessa] Ever since I was a little girl,
translation.it: Fin da quando ero piccola, la gente mi diceva

translation.en: people always told me that I see things that no one else does.
translation.it: Fin da quando ero piccola, la gente mi diceva che vedevo cose che nessun altro vede.

translation.en: It wasn't just that my camera was a way for me to express myself.
translation.it: La mia macchina fotografica non era solo un modo per esprimermi.

translation.en: It was the means by which I captured the unseen.
translation.it: Era il mezzo con cui catturavo l'invisibile.

translation.en: It was only recently that I discovered something that I had been blind to.
translation.it: Solo di recente ho scoperto una cosa che ignoravo.

translation.en: A ghost.
All of us, each and every one of us, are haunted by ghosts.
translation.it: Tutti noi siamo perseguitati dai fantasmi.

translation.en: The ghosts of childhood trauma.
The ghosts of unfulfilled dreams.
The ghosts of lost love.
Like so many people, I believed that if I just ignored these ghosts,
translation.it: Come tante persone, credevo che ignorando questi fantasmi,

translation.en: they would eventually go away.
This turned out to be a mistake.
Just like all of our worst fears,
these invisible spirits gain strength in darkness.
translation.it: questi spiriti invisibili acquistano forza nell'oscurità.

translation.en: If we run from them, they run faster.
translation.it: Se scappiamo da loro, corrono più veloci.

translation.en: If we push them away, they just push back harder.
translation.it: Se li respingiamo, loro insistono di più.

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
It has taken…
great personal loss
for me to discover the answer to this question.
We must attend to our ghosts.
We must welcome them into our lives
as though they are part of us, because they are part of us.
translation.it: come se fossero parte di noi, perché sono parte di noi.

translation.en: It's only when we acknowledge their presence will they make room for new possibilities.
translation.it: Riconoscendo la loro presenza, faranno spazio a nuove possibilità.

translation.en: In the end, I've learned that our ghosts are part of who we are,
translation.it: Ho imparato che i nostri fantasmi sono parte di chi siamo

translation.en: part of who we hope to be.
These hauntings stay inside us,
translation.it: I fantasmi restano dentro di noi,

translation.en: tethered to our hearts forever.
translation.it: legati ai nostri cuori per sempre.

translation.en: In life.
In death.
And… everywhere in-between.
translation.it: e in tutto quello che c'è nel mezzo.
